con:request.name: Void (Sale 2)
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Requests" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r <tem:request>\r <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId>\r <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password>\r <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId>\r <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Amount>0</acr1:Amount>\r <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardExpirationDate>\r${CardExpDate}</acr1:CardExpirationDate> <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits>\r <acr1:CardNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CardVerificationNumber/>\r <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode>\r <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:CustomerZipCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber>\r <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:NameOnCard xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:ReferenceNumber>${Sale 2#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.Client.VirtualTerminal.v6.v4.Common.Responses'; //ns1:ProcessCreditCardResponse[1]/ns1:ProcessCreditCardResult[1]/a:ReferenceNumber[1]}</acr1:ReferenceNumber>\r <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true"/>\r <acr1:TaxAmount>${TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount>\r <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities>\r <acr1:TransactionType>Void</acr1:TransactionType>\r </tem:request>\r </tem:ProcessCreditCard>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
